assertions.description: Open https://www.zoho.com
Verify that the browser tab title contains 'Zoho'
Ensure main banner, header, and footer load fully
Confirm no broken links or images appear on page
Expected: Homepage loads successfully with title 'Zoho' and all UI elements visible (Priority: High)
Go to https://www.zoho.com
Click each top navigation link (Products, Solutions, Customers, Pricing)
Observe navigation and page title after each click
Expected: Each navigation item redirects to the correct page without error (Priority: High)
From the homepage, click 'Products' in the main navigation
Wait for the page to load
Verify all Zoho product cards and logos are displayed correctly
Expected: Products page loads all Zoho applications without broken content (Priority: High)
Visit any subpage on Zoho.com (e.g., /mail/)
Click the Zoho logo at the top-left corner
Observe whether it navigates to homepage
Expected: User is redirected to https://www.zoho.com homepage (Priority: Medium)

phases.objective: TC012: Explore All Products button navigation

assertions.description: On the homepage, locate and click 'Explore All Products'
Wait for page transition
Observe the product list display
Expected: 'Explore All Products' button redirects user to the Products page showing all apps (Priority: Medium)
Locate language selector in the footer or header (if present)
Change language from English to another available language
Observe page reload and text updates
Expected: Website content updates to chosen language while layout remains consistent (Priority: Medium)
Open https://www.zoho.com
Locate search bar or icon
Enter the keyword 'CRM' and press Enter
Wait for results to load
Expected: Search results page lists CRM-related products and articles (Priority: High)
Hover mouse over 'Products' and 'Solutions' in the top menu
Observe if submenus expand
Move the mouse away and ensure menu collapses
Expected: Dropdown submenus expand and collapse smoothly without freezing (Priority: Low)
Open https://www.zoho.com
Click 'Free Sign Up' button
Fill in required fields (Name, Email, Password)
Submit the form and wait for next screen
Expected: Signup process completes with success or verification prompt (Priority: High)
Navigate to https://www.zoho.com/mail/
Click 'Sign In'
Enter valid credentials (test account)
Click 'Sign In' and observe redirection
Expected: User is redirected to Zoho Mail dashboard successfully (Priority: High)

phases.objective: TC017: Signup with already registered email

assertions.description: Navigate to Zoho signup page via https://www.zoho.com/signup.html
Enter an email that is already registered
Fill all fields correctly and submit
Expected: System displays error message like 'Email already exists' (Priority: High)
Go to signup form
Try passwords missing lowercase, uppercase, or special characters
Submit and observe error messages
Expected: Form displays password policy errors until a strong password is provided (Priority: High)
Go to Zoho login page
Click 'Forgot Password'
Enter a valid registered email
Submit form and check for confirmation message
Expected: Password reset email is sent with confirmation on screen (Priority: High)
Navigate to Zoho login page
Enter invalid username and password
Click 'Sign In'
Observe feedback message
Expected: Login fails and user sees appropriate error message without revealing sensitive details (Priority: High)
Log in to Zoho.com with valid credentials
Wait for dashboard or homepage to load
Observe top navigation bar for the user name or avatar
Click the profile icon to verify account menu details
Expected: Logged-in user's name or email is displayed correctly in the top navigation (Priority: Medium)
Log in to Zoho.com with valid credentials
Click profile icon and select 'Logout'
Verify redirection after logout
Attempt to use browser back button to access restricted content
Expected: User is logged out and redirected to homepage or login screen; no session retained (Priority: High)
Log in to Zoho.com
Stay idle for configured timeout duration (e.g., 15–30 minutes)
Attempt to navigate or refresh the page
Expected: Session expires and user is prompted to re-login (Priority: Medium)
Initiate 'Forgot Password' on the login screen
Open registered email inbox
Click the password reset link provided
Enter and confirm new password
Attempt login with updated credentials
Expected: Password is successfully updated and user can log in with new credentials (Priority: Medium)
Log in to Zoho.com with a valid test account
Navigate to Account Settings > Privacy or Security section
Click 'Delete Account' and follow confirmation steps
Try logging in again after deletion
Expected: Account is permanently deleted; subsequent logins fail with proper message (Priority: Low)

phases.objective: TC016: Request a Demo button validation

assertions.description: Go to Zoho.com homepage or a product landing page (e.g., CRM)
Click 'Request a Demo'
Observe redirection or popup form behavior
If a form appears, check required fields and submission behavior
Expected: 'Request a Demo' button opens correct form or redirects user to demo booking page (Priority: Medium)
Open https://www.zoho.com
Hover over 'Products' in top menu
Select 'CRM' from dropdown
Verify that the Zoho CRM product page loads correctly
Expected: Zoho CRM product page loads with hero banner and call-to-action visible (Priority: High)

phases.objective: TC026: Product card navigation on Products page

assertions.description: Visit https://www.zoho.com/products.html or Products menu
Click multiple product cards (e.g., CRM, Books, Mail)
Observe page redirection and URL consistency
Expected: Each product card links correctly to the corresponding product landing page (Priority: Medium)

phases.objective: TC027: Zoho CRM feature tab functionality

assertions.description: Go to https://www.zoho.com/crm/
Click on feature tabs such as Overview, Features, and Pricing
Verify content area updates with relevant data
Scroll through each section
Expected: Each feature tab dynamically loads correct information without page errors (Priority: High)
On Zoho CRM product page, click 'Try Now' button
Observe navigation or popup form
Confirm it leads to signup or trial initiation process
Expected: Clicking 'Try Now' initiates trial or redirects user to signup flow (Priority: Medium)

phases.objective: TC029: Embedded product demo video playback

assertions.description: Go to any Zoho product page containing an embedded video
Click play on video element
Verify playback starts and controls work (pause, mute, fullscreen)
Observe buffering or playback quality
Expected: Video plays without lag or error; user controls function correctly (Priority: Low)
Navigate to any product page with customer testimonials
Click left/right navigation arrows
Observe if new testimonials load
Wait for automatic rotation if applicable
Expected: Testimonials rotate automatically and manually with no visual glitches (Priority: Low)
Visit Zoho homepage or a product features section
Click 'Learn More' under multiple feature descriptions
Observe redirection and page content
Expected: Each 'Learn More' link navigates to the relevant documentation or product detail page (Priority: Medium)
Visit a product page (e.g., Zoho Projects)
Locate the image carousel or screenshot gallery
Click or swipe through multiple images
Observe transitions and responsiveness
Expected: All screenshots load correctly and carousel navigation works smoothly (Priority: Low)
Navigate from Products list to an individual product (e.g., CRM)
Click the browser's back button
Observe the navigation behavior and URL change
Expected: User is returned to previous Products page without error or re-login prompt (Priority: Low)
Visit a specific Zoho product page (e.g., Books or Campaigns)
Scroll to the contact or demo section
Click 'Contact Sales' or 'Request Info'
Fill in valid details and submit the form
Expected: Contact form submission shows success message or confirmation prompt (Priority: Medium)
Open the Pricing page for any Zoho product (e.g., https://www.zoho.com/crm/pricing.html)
Scroll down to the 'Compare Plans' or 'Plan Comparison' section
Click the button or tab labeled 'Compare Plans'
Verify that a table with multiple plan tiers appears
Check that scrolling and feature comparison work correctly
Expected: Comparison table loads properly showing clear differences between plans (Priority: Medium)
Go to a product's Pricing page (e.g., https://www.zoho.com/crm/pricing.html)
Ensure all available plans (Free, Standard, Professional, Enterprise, etc.) are displayed
Confirm pricing is visible for each plan tier
Expected: All pricing tiers and details display accurately without missing data (Priority: High)

phases.objective: TC037: Monthly and yearly billing toggle

assertions.description: On a product Pricing page, locate billing cycle toggle (Monthly/Yearly)
Switch between both options
Observe price changes for each plan
Verify displayed currency consistency
Expected: Plan prices update correctly when toggling billing cycle (Priority: High)
On the Pricing page, click 'Buy Now' for a plan
Wait for redirection to checkout or payment gateway
Observe URL and SSL certificate
Ensure form fields load correctly
Expected: User is redirected securely to the checkout page for selected plan (Priority: High)
On the checkout page, locate the promo/coupon code input
Enter a valid promo code and apply it
Verify discount is applied to total price
Enter an invalid code and verify error message
Expected: Valid codes apply discounts correctly, and invalid codes display an appropriate error (Priority: Medium)
On Pricing page, select different currencies (USD, EUR, INR)
Observe price updates for all plans
Check consistency in exchange rate and formatting
Expected: Displayed plan prices update correctly to selected currency with accurate values (Priority: Medium)
Go to https://www.zoho.com/contact.html
Fill Name, Email, and Message fields with valid data
Click Submit
Observe confirmation or error message
Expected: Form submission returns success message or confirmation email (Priority: Medium)
Navigate to Zoho Support or Help Center
Click 'Submit a Ticket' or 'Contact Support'
Fill all required fields with valid data
Submit the ticket and note confirmation message
Expected: Support ticket is submitted successfully and confirmation is displayed (Priority: High)

phases.objective: TC045: Error messages on invalid contact form inputs

assertions.description: Go to Contact page
Enter invalid email format or leave required fields empty
Try submitting the form
Expected: Proper error messages are displayed for invalid or missing inputs (Priority: High)

phases.objective: TC060: Form input character limits enforcement

assertions.description: On signup and contact forms, input data exceeding field length limits
Attempt to submit the form
Observe validation messages or input truncation
Expected: Forms enforce character limits and prevent overflow errors (Priority: Medium)
Open https://www.zoho.com
Wait 10–15 seconds on the homepage
Observe the main banner carousel
Verify automatic rotation of slides
Use navigation arrows or dots to switch manually
Expected: Carousel slides change automatically and manually without lag or layout shifts (Priority: Low)
Open Zoho homepage
Resize browser to desktop (1920x1080), tablet (768x1024), mobile (375x812)
Observe header, text, and buttons across viewports
Expected: Layout adjusts seamlessly without text overlap or broken layouts (Priority: Medium)
Open Zoho.com on a mobile device or responsive emulator
Tap on the hamburger menu icon
Expand all menu items and submenus
Tap to navigate to selected pages
Expected: Mobile menu opens/closes smoothly and links navigate correctly (Priority: Medium)
Open Zoho.com homepage on mobile device
Check header, banner, call-to-action buttons
Scroll down and verify text and images adjust properly
Expected: Homepage layout is responsive and user-friendly on mobile (Priority: Medium)

phases.objective: TC049: Browser back and forward navigation test

assertions.description: Navigate between multiple pages (e.g., Homepage → Products → CRM)
Use browser back button to return to previous pages
Use browser forward button to go ahead again
Expected: Navigation through browser buttons works without errors or reload issues (Priority: Low)
Scroll to the footer of homepage
Click each link (Privacy Policy, Terms of Service, etc.)
Observe if links open correctly in new tab
Expected: Each footer link opens respective policy page without broken links (Priority: Medium)
Scroll to footer
Click each social media icon (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, etc.)
Confirm links open the correct social page in a new tab
Expected: Each social media icon redirects to Zoho's official pages correctly (Priority: Low)

phases.objective: TC047: Newsletter subscription with valid email

assertions.description: Find newsletter subscription box on homepage or footer
Enter a valid email and submit
Observe confirmation or thank you message
Expected: Subscription succeeds with confirmation displayed (Priority: Medium)

phases.objective: TC048: Newsletter subscription with invalid email

assertions.description: Enter invalid email format in subscription box
Submit form
Verify error message is displayed
Expected: Proper validation prevents submission and shows error (Priority: Medium)

phases.objective: TC050: Check 404 error page for invalid URLs

assertions.description: Manually enter invalid URL (e.g., https://www.zoho.com/invalidpage)
Observe error page content
Look for link or button to return to homepage
Expected: Custom 404 page loads with user-friendly message and homepage link (Priority: Low)
Open Zoho.com homepage
Locate and click on the live chat icon (usually bottom right)
Type a simple query and send
Observe response time and chat functionality
Expected: Live chat opens correctly and provides a response or automated message promptly (Priority: Medium)
Navigate to Zoho Support or Help Center
Click 'Submit a Ticket' or 'Contact Support'
Fill all required fields with valid data
Submit the ticket and note confirmation message
Expected: Support ticket is submitted successfully and confirmation is displayed (Priority: High)

phases.objective: TC051: HTTPS enforcement and SSL validation

assertions.description: Navigate to https://www.zoho.com
Verify the URL begins with HTTPS
Click the padlock icon in the browser address bar
Check certificate validity and issuer details
Expected: Site uses valid SSL certificate and enforces HTTPS (Priority: High)

phases.objective: TC052: Cross-site scripting (XSS) prevention on forms

assertions.description: Access various forms (signup, contact, support ticket)
Input common XSS payloads like `<script>alert(1)</script>` into text fields
Submit forms and monitor page behavior
Expected: Inputs are sanitized and no script execution occurs (Priority: High)
Locate external links on site (social media, partners)
Inspect anchor tags for rel='noopener noreferrer'
Click links and ensure they open in new tabs securely
Expected: External links open securely preventing potential tabnabbing (Priority: Low)
Open Zoho homepage
Use Tab key to navigate through interactive elements
Use Enter or Space to activate buttons and links
Verify focus indicators are visible
Expected: Full site navigation is possible with keyboard alone and focus states are clear (Priority: Medium)
Enable a screen reader (e.g., NVDA or VoiceOver)
Navigate key pages (homepage, product page, signup)
Verify page elements have proper ARIA labels and roles
Listen for logical reading order
Expected: Site content is accessible and understandable via screen readers (Priority: Medium)

phases.objective: TC055: Page load time under 3 seconds

assertions.description: Open Zoho homepage on a standard broadband connection
Measure time from request initiation to full page load
Repeat for key product pages
Expected: Pages load fully within 3 seconds (Priority: Medium)

phases.objective: TC056: Responsive images and lazy loading

assertions.description: Open product pages with many images
Scroll through the page slowly
Check if images load only as they come into viewport
Expected: Images load on demand improving page performance (Priority: Low)
Visit Zoho.com homepage with cleared cookies
Observe if cookie consent banner appears
Accept or reject cookies
Refresh page and check banner persistence
Expected: Cookie consent banner behaves as expected and stores user preference (Priority: Medium)

phases.objective: TC057: Check for SEO meta tags presence

assertions.description: Inspect page source for homepage and product pages
Verify presence of title, description, keywords meta tags
Confirm usage of canonical tags
Expected: SEO meta tags are present and properly formatted (Priority: Low)
